constantValues: Prospect or potential sales opportunity. Leads are converted into accounts, contacts, or opportunities when they are qualified. Otherwise, they are deleted or archived.

members.description: Combines and shows the lead's Yomi first and last names so the full phonetic name can be displayed in views and reports.

members.name: yomiLastName

constantValues: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's last name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

members.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's last name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

members.name: yomiMiddleName

constantValues: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's middle name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

members.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's middle name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the campaign that the lead was generated from to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and identify  communications received by the lead.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the campaign that the lead was generated from to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and identify  communications received by the lead.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: This attribute is used for Sample Service Business Processes.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: This attribute is used for Sample Service Business Processes.

constantValues: Choose the opportunity that the lead was qualified on and then converted to.
